name: Transfer perspective leads to KlickTipp
description:
This scenario listens for new lead submissions in your Perspective Funnels account and automatically creates or updates the corresponding contact in KlickTipp—with the perfect tag to kick off your email‑marketing workflows.

Ideal for coaches, consultants, trainers and digital‑product creators who use high‑converting funnels in Perspective Funnels—and want every new prospect fed straight into KlickTipp without any manual steps.

You can map any fields you collect in Perspective Funnels (First Name, Last Name, Email, Custom Responses) and define tag‑and‑segment rules based on user interactions—e.g. “Opt‑in Page Viewed,” “Webinar Registered,” or “Order Bump Accepted.” That way, each lead is instantly tagged and segmented for personalized follow‑up sequences, so you nurture your prospects from the very first funnel touchpoint with zero extra effort.
